messages.message:
Not sure if this is the right channel to post this on, but here we go:

JPMC are looking to integrate with UiPath (to eventually get downstream systems) - they are asking if we have the ability to push an event to UiPath (with the JobID) once a job completes? We’ll need to check what inbound function UiPath have, but from our side is this possible?
when you say “push an event”, is this calling an uipath api? If it is, we can do this in post flow udfs or reduce udf steps in flow v3
